articles.description: England host Sri Lanka in the third Test at Kia Oval – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka LIVE: Third Test, day two, Kia Oval – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Legendary former Liverpool captain Ron Yeats dies at the age of 86.
articles.title: Ron Yeats: Liverpool legend dies aged 86

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper throws up on court during a dramatic US Open semi-final defeat where world number one Jannik Sinner ultimately proves a step up in class.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jack Draper sick on court in semi-final defeat by Jannik Sinner in New York

articles.description: England interim manager Lee Carsley will not sing the British national anthem before Republic of Ireland game.
articles.title: Lee Carsley and the British national anthem explained before Republic of Ireland v England

articles.description: Taylor Fritz becomes the first American man in 15 years to reach a Grand Slam singles final as he beats compatriot Frances Tiafoe at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Taylor Fritz beats Frances Tiafoe to reach final against Jannik Sinner

articles.description: Saquon Barkley scores three touchdowns on his debut as the Philadelphia Eagles beat the Green Bay Packers 34-29 in the first NFL game played in South America.
articles.title: Philadelphia Eagles 34-29 Green Bay Packers: Saquon Barkley scores three touchdowns on debut

articles.description: Leading F1 designer Adrian Newey will join Aston Martin in a deal worth up to £30m a year.
articles.title: Aston Martin: Adrian Newey will join in £30m-a-year deal

articles.description: Craig Bellamy oversaw a 0-0 draw in his first match as Wales boss against Turkey at Cardiff City Stadium.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy's start as Wales manager excites fans

articles.description: Luis Suarez's 17-year international career comes to a close as Uruguay are held to goalless draw against Paraguay in a South American World Cup qualifier.
articles.title: Luis Suarez's Uruguay career ends with Paraguay draw
